title: Toxicity of the mixture of nanoparticles to algae–bacteria consortia in OECD media
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3033-3052
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00918A, Paper
Samridhi Rana, Arun Kumar
Toxicity trend of 0.1 mg L−1 NPs in consortia: CuO > ZnO > CuO + ZnO. At 0.1 mg L−1, NP toxic effect was antagonistic and resulted in a higher decrease in bacterial count than algal count. Growth of consortia in a mixture of NPs up to 0.1 mg L−1 is possible.
